慽字的基本解释

慽
qī
古同“戚”②。

慽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qī］
同“慼1”。
忧愁；悲伤。

慽字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　慽； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页401第14
【正字通】同慼。【後漢·王商傳】居喪哀慽。◎按《說文》本作慽，無慼字。《集韻》慽亦書作慼。則慽爲正字矣。《正字通》云：同慼，誤。

小篆楷体

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　慽; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 401-14
【Zhengzitong】Same as Qi. [Later Han·Wang Shang Biography] mourning and mourning. ◎According to "Suo Wen", this is a poem, without the word Qi. "Ji Yun" is also written as Qi. Then it is straight. "Zhengzitong" says: Same Qi, wrong.
